desc: Made in USA for patient self-care, Necessary Comforts produces post-surgery drain holders to increase a patient's comfort and security during at-home recovery. Uses following a Mastectomy, DMX, tummy tuck, pancreatic surgery, heart surgery, top surgery, BBL, Breast augmentation, Breast Cancer Recovery Gift, Cancer gift

layout.text: Surgical drain holders for post-surgery recovery
Perfect for returning home from a mastectomy, pancreatic surgery, heart surgery, breast enhancement, tummy tuck, or a make-over.
